pr_title: xds: change route data validation logic

timeline.message: Routes with action that specifies cluster_header should be skipped.
Eliminate unnecessary validation logic in XdsClientImpl, they are already covered in converters.

timeline.bodyText: Justification: The converted object EnvoyProtoData.Route is guaranteed to have one of cluster or weighted_cluster set. So this logic is redundant here.
timeline.author: voidzcy

timeline.bodyText: No longer require the default route to have cluster as the cluster_specifier.
timeline.author: voidzcy
